pkgmetadata.longdescription: Citizen Voting Age Population // Works with the Citizen Voting Age Population special tabulation from the US Census Bureau https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial- census/about/voting-rights/cvap.html. Provides tools to download and process raw data. Also provides a downloading interface to processed data. Implements a very basic approach to estimate block level citizen voting age population from block group data.
